name: v25-bears-team-05
description: A LinkedIn style app for developers | Voyage-25 | https://chingu.io/

scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run server" "npm run app"
scripts.dev-win: SET NODE_ENV=development & concurrently "npm run server" "npm run app"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install --prefix app && npm run build --prefix app
